Class logger

boost::log::sources::logger — Narrow-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_logger.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/log/sources/logger.hpp>


class logger : public basic_composite_logger< char, logger, single_thread_model, features<  > >
{
};

Description

See basic_logger class template for a more detailed description.
